title: how  does urgot even sleep?????????
body: seriously i need to know. for science

replies.body:
I wonder what he does in his free time. I mean, he is still a human. When he's not grinding up champions to their death on the rift, what goes on?

 Maybe he's a splash painter, with canisters replacing where his shotguns are. Maybe he just stays at home watching television and knitting.

> [{quoted}](name=Danjeng,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Pl9T3rPz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-26T17:02:49.185+0000)
>
> I wonder what he does in his free time. I mean, he is still a human. When he's not grinding up champions to their death on the rift, what goes on?
> 
>  Maybe he's a splash painter, with canisters replacing where his shotguns are. Maybe he just stays at home watching television and knitting.

urgot definitely writes poems in his spare time

"Eternal Life Endless Torture" by Urgot

_As a young lad, I 
had few friends
Stack tears, I cry
try to make amends
but they laugh at me
say I am ugly
Everyday a misery
in this cursed world,
I fought for
And against boundless odds
refuse to die._

_Half man - half machine
Now nobody dares make fun of this mien
Though you all hate my wretched existence
I love all of you. Wouldn't you agree
how wonderful it would be
if you were made a part of me?_
My guess is standing up, lock the mechanics in his legs and the cross his arms or something
Could be he has some mechanic to detach his upper body from the chemtech legs.
He wouldn't make himself that vulnerable

But what if Urgot wants some sexy time?
What kind of woman would let him touch her?

{{champion:164}} Oooooooh..... His crush for Camille makes alot more sense now....
